/.title: Home
/.content: Welcome to Nouvells, where we empower every project to thrive. Explore job opportunities, professional services, and resources crafted to elevate your goals.
/.description: Nouvels homepage - discover resources and services that drive project success.

/jobs.title: Job Opportunities
/jobs.content: Browse open positions across various industries. Whether you're looking for freelance, full-time, or part-time roles, find a job that fits your skills and ambitions.
/jobs.description: Explore job listings tailored to diverse skills and industries on Nouvels.

/services.title: Our Services
/services.content: Nouvels offers an array of services designed to support projects at all stages. From consulting to development, we help bring ideas to life with precision and expertise.
/services.description: Explore our professional services that cater to diverse project needs, including consulting and development.

/blog.title: Blog
/blog.content: Discover industry insights, career advice, and the latest updates from Nouvels. Our blog is a resource for everyone looking to thrive in the professional world.
/blog.description: Stay updated with the latest industry insights, news, and career advice on the Nouvels blog.

/#coming-soon.title: Company - Coming Soon
/#coming-soon.content: Our company details and vision are coming soon! Stay tuned to learn more about Nouvels.
/#coming-soon.description: Learn more about Nouvels' mission, vision, and values - coming soon!
